result.execSummary:
Michael Kevin Charlsen was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Michael Kevin Charlsen was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael Kevin Charlsen

records.addlTxt: Bail/bond hearing on June 24, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

01:10 PM   CO: SJN, RPR: V. Deiss, Clerk: S. Fox, ADA:  Intern A. Casey with ADA Brian Thomas Smestad, DF ATTY:  Travis Satorius, DF:  Michael Kevin Charlsen appeared. PD office has spoken to the Def re: extradition. Def states he has a hearing on 6/20/22 at 4 pm. in Branch 3 however, due to this extradition he may be incarcerated for that hearing. Def to be given another PFAC for case 22CM255 and court directs him to file to enable Branch 3 to appoint an attorney.  Defendant wishes to voluntarily waive extradition.  Defendant executes Waiver and court certifies same. S/T from defendant.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for June 24, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Initial appearance on June 16, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

1:18 PM  CO: SJN, RPR: V. Deiss, Clerk: K. Anderson, ADA: Brian Thomas Smestad and Intern Ali Casey, DF ATTY: Jeremiah James Harrelson for today, DF: Michael Kevin Charlsen appeared from jail. Atty. Harrelson states that DE did not wish to speak to public defender during interviews this morning, DE has since decided to speak with public defender regarding waiving extradition. Court adjourns until tomorrow to allow DE to speak with public defender. Adjourned: 1:21 PM. kma  Initial appearance scheduled for June 16, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Initial appearance on June 15, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Signed by DE and SJN on 06/16/22. hml
